description: Low-confidence research queue â€” specimens needing targeted research to improve classification confidence. Use `/research low-confidence` to process.

entries.whatToLookFor: Confirm whether gRED Computational Sciences operates as an embedded team within wet lab groups (M3) or as a separate research unit (M1). Look for org charts, reporting lines, team size. Find URLs for Roche investor presentations and BioPharma Dive articles referenced in legacy sources.

Confirm whether LG AI Research is a CoE (M2) or a research lab (M1). Look for: Does LG AI Research publish papers as primary output? Does it set standards/enable others (M2) or do fundamental research (M1)? What is its relationship to business units?
